page.title: 06Employment in Caerhun Parish
page.content: Employment varies greatly but farming is predominant. It is mostly hill farming but there is some arable farming in low-lying areas. Major employers in the area are Dolgarrog Aluminium Works, the Electricity Board and the Welsh Water Authority. Examples of other employment are: gardening and nursery work, carpentry, double glazing, heavy goods vehicle driving, school canteen and pupil supervision. A few young people work in the village cafe. Shop assistants, a teacher, a doctor, a builder and a philatelist live in this area.Some people travel as far as Holyhead and Chester to work. Many inhabitants are retired. All agree it is a happy, law-abiding community.
